trans-unit.source: Hosts a collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Hospeda uma coleção de objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn> class is a specialized type of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn> class used to logically host cells that display images.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn> classe é um tipo especializado do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn> classe usada para logicamente células de host que exibem imagens.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn> has an associated <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell> in every <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> that intersects it.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn> possui um tipo de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell> em cada <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> que faz interseção com ele.

trans-unit.source: Each cell is capable of containing an <xref:System.Drawing.Image> or an <xref:System.Drawing.Icon>, depending on the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: Cada célula é capaz de conter um <xref:System.Drawing.Image> ou um <xref:System.Drawing.Icon>, dependendo do valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Displaying icons is useful to accommodate images with transparency.
trans-unit.target: Exibindo ícones é útil para acomodar imagens com transparência.

trans-unit.source: By default, empty cells display a default error graphic.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, as células vazias exibem um gráfico de erro padrão.

trans-unit.source: To prevent this graphic from appearing for cell values equal to `null` or <xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=nameWithType>, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of the cell style object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property to `null` before adding rows to the control.
trans-unit.target: Para evitar este gráfico seja exibida para valores de célula iguais a `null` ou <xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=nameWithType>, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade do objeto de estilo de célula retornada pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A> propriedade `null` antes de adicionar linhas ao controle.

trans-unit.source: This does not affect the row for new records, however.
trans-unit.target: Isso não afeta a linha para novos registros, no entanto.

trans-unit.source: To prevent the error graphic from appearing in the row for new records when the control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows%2A> property value is `true`, you must also either explicitly set the cell value to `null` in a handler for the control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsAdded> event or set the column <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property to an instance of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell>-derived type with an overridden <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.DefaultNewRowValue%2A> property that returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: Para impedir que o gráfico de erro que aparece na linha para novos registros quando o controle <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows%2A> é o valor da propriedade `true`, também deve defina explicitamente o valor da célula como `null` em um manipulador para o controle <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsAdded> evento ou a coluna do conjunto <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A> propriedade a uma instância de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell>-derivado do tipo com uma substituição <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.DefaultNewRowValue%2A> propriedade retorna `null`.

trans-unit.source: The default sort mode for this column type is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode.NotSortable>.
trans-unit.target: O modo de classificação padrão para esse tipo de coluna é <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode.NotSortable>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use images to create a TicTacToe game.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar imagens para criar um jogo TicTacToe.

trans-unit.source: When you derive from <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn" /> and add new properties to the derived class, be sure to override the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Clone" /> method to copy the new properties during cloning operations.
trans-unit.target: Quando você deriva de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn" /> e adicionar novas propriedades para a classe derivada, certifique-se de substituir o <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Clone" /> método para copiar as novas propriedades durante operações de clonagem.

trans-unit.source: You should also call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Clone" /> method so that the properties of the base class are copied to the new cell.
trans-unit.target: Você também deve chamar a classe base <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Clone" /> método para que as propriedades da classe base são copiadas para a nova célula.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn" /> class, configuring it for use with cell values of type <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn" />, configurando-a para o uso com valores de célula do tipo <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />.

trans-unit.source: This constructor calls <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.%23ctor%28System.Boolean%29> with a `valuesAreIcons` parameter value of `false`.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor chama <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.%23ctor%28System.Boolean%29> com um `valuesAreIcons` valor de parâmetro de `false`.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate that the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value" /> property of cells in this column will be set to values of type <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Icon" />; <see langword="false" /> to indicate that they will be set to values of type <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para indicar que a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value" /> de células nesta coluna será definida para valores do tipo <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Icon" />; <see langword="false" /> para indicar que eles serão definidos para os valores do tipo <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn" /> class, optionally configuring it for use with <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Icon" /> cell values.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn" /> configurando-a opcionalmente para uso com valores de célula <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Icon" />.

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the column by setting the following properties.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor inicializa a coluna, definindo as propriedades a seguir.

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Propriedade

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: Valor

trans-unit.source: A new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell> with its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A> property initialized to the `valuesAreIcons` parameter value.
trans-unit.target: Um novo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell> com seus <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A> propriedade inicializada para o `valuesAreIcons` o valor do parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: The value of the `valuesAreIcons` parameter.
trans-unit.target: O valor de `valuesAreIcons` parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> objeto retornado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> objeto retornado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: A standard error graphic of type <xref:System.Drawing.Icon> if `valuesAreIcons` is `true` and type <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap> if `valuesAreIcons` is `false`.
trans-unit.target: Um gráfico de erro padrão do tipo <xref:System.Drawing.Icon> se `valuesAreIcons` é `true` e tipo <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap> se `valuesAreIcons` é `false`.

trans-unit.source: To ensure that the alpha channel of <xref:System.Drawing.Icon> cell values is painted correctly, use this constructor with a `valuesAreIcons` parameter value of `true`.
trans-unit.target: Para garantir que o canal alfa de <xref:System.Drawing.Icon> valores de célula é pintado corretamente, use este construtor com um `valuesAreIcons` valor de parâmetro de `true`.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the template used to create new cells.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o modelo usado para criar novas células.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> that all other cells in the column are modeled after.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> depois do qual todas as outras células na coluna são modeladas.

trans-unit.source: The constructors for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn> class initialize this property to a newly created <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell>.
trans-unit.target: Os construtores de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn> classe inicializar esta propriedade recém-criado para um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell>.

trans-unit.source: Changing the properties of the cell template will not immediately affect the user interface (UI) of the column's existing cells.
trans-unit.target: Alterar as propriedades do modelo de célula não afetará imediatamente a interface do usuário (UI) de células existentes da coluna.

trans-unit.source: These changes are only apparent after the column is regenerated (for example, by sorting the column or through a call to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.InvalidateColumn%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method).
trans-unit.target: Essas alterações são aparentes somente depois que a coluna for gerado novamente (por exemplo, ao classificar a coluna ou por meio de uma chamada para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.InvalidateColumn%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método).

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.CellTemplate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property, which is similar to this property.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra o uso do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.CellTemplate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade, que é semelhante a esta propriedade.

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Manipulate Columns in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-manipulate-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é parte de um exemplo maior disponível em [como: manipular colunas no controle DataGridView de formulários do Windows](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-manipulate-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).

trans-unit.source: The set type is not compatible with type <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell" />.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de conjunto não é compatível com o tipo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates an exact copy of this column.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma cópia exata desta coluna.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that represents the cloned <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Object" /> que representa o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn" /> clonado.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to duplicate a column of cells.
trans-unit.target: Use esse método para duplicar uma coluna de células.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the column's default cell style.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o estilo da célula padrão da coluna.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle" /> to be applied as the default style.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle" /> a ser aplicado como estilo padrão.

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> returned by this property has the following initial property values:
trans-unit.target: O padrão <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> retornados por essa propriedade tem os seguintes valores de propriedade inicial:

trans-unit.source: `DataGridViewCellStyle` property
trans-unit.target: Propriedade `DataGridViewCellStyle`

trans-unit.source: Default value
trans-unit.target: Valor padrão

trans-unit.source: A standard error graphic of type <xref:System.Drawing.Icon> if the initial <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A> property value is `true`; otherwise, a standard error graphic of type <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>.
trans-unit.target: Um gráfico de erro padrão do tipo <xref:System.Drawing.Icon> se inicial <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A> é o valor da propriedade `true`; caso contrário, um gráfico de erro padrão do tipo <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>.

trans-unit.source: These values override the value specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control, but may be overridden by other cell style properties.
trans-unit.target: Esses valores de substituem o valor especificado no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> controle, mas podem ser substituídas por outras propriedades de estilo de célula.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [Estilos de célula no controle DataGridView dos Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).

trans-unit.source: To prevent the standard error graphic from appearing for `null` or <xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=nameWithType> cell values, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property for this cell style object to `null` or your own error graphic before adding rows to the control.
trans-unit.target: Para impedir que o gráfico de erro padrão que aparecem para `null` ou <xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=nameWithType> valores de célula, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade para este objeto de estilo de célula para `null` ou seu próprio gráfico de erro antes de adicionar linhas ao controle.

trans-unit.source: This does not affect the row for new records, however.
trans-unit.target: Isso não afeta a linha para novos registros, no entanto.

trans-unit.source: To prevent the error graphic from appearing in the row for new records when the control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows%2A> property value is `true`, you must also either explicitly set the cell value to `null` or your own error graphic in a handler for the control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsAdded> event or set the column <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property to an instance of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell>-derived type with an overridden <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.DefaultNewRowValue%2A> property that returns `null` or your own error graphic.
trans-unit.target: Para impedir que o gráfico de erro que aparece na linha para novos registros quando o controle <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows%2A> é o valor da propriedade `true`, também deve defina explicitamente o valor da célula como `null` ou seu próprio gráfico de erro em um manipulador para o controle <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsAdded> evento ou a coluna do conjunto <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A> propriedade a uma instância de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell>-derivado do tipo com uma substituição <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.DefaultNewRowValue%2A> propriedade retorna `null` ou seu próprio gráfico de erro.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property has a value equal to the standard error graphic of type <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>, changing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A> property value to `true` automatically sets <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> to the standard error graphic of type <xref:System.Drawing.Icon>.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> propriedade do objeto retornado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A> propriedade tem um valor igual ao gráfico de erro padrão do tipo <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>, alterando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A> valor da propriedade `true` define automaticamente <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> para o gráfico de erro padrão do tipo <xref:System.Drawing.Icon>.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> has a value equal to the standard error graphic of type <xref:System.Drawing.Icon>, changing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A> property value to `false` automatically sets <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> to the standard error graphic of type <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> tem um valor igual ao gráfico de erro padrão do tipo <xref:System.Drawing.Icon>, alterando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A> valor da propriedade `false` define automaticamente <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> para o gráfico de erro padrão do tipo <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this property.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra o uso dessa propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a string that describes the column's image.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define uma cadeia de caracteres que descreve a imagem da coluna.

trans-unit.source: The textual description of the column image.
trans-unit.target: A descrição textual da imagem de coluna.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Description%2A> property to describe the image provided by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Image%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Icon%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Description%2A> propriedade para descrever a imagem fornecida pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Image%2A> ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Icon%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: This description provides an accessible alternative to the image.
trans-unit.target: Essa descrição fornece uma alternativa acessível para a imagem.

trans-unit.source: Additionally, the description text is used when the cell value is copied onto the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, o texto de descrição é usado quando o valor da célula é copiado para a área de transferência.

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.Description%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Obter ou definir esta propriedade obtém ou define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.Description%2A> propriedade do objeto retornado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.Description%2A> property of every cell in the column.
trans-unit.target: Definir esta propriedade também define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.Description%2A> a propriedade de cada célula na coluna.

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: Para substituir o valor especificado para células individuais, defina os valores de célula depois de definir o valor da coluna.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Description%2A> property to reflect the image layout.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Description%2A> propriedade para refletir o layout de imagem.

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Work with Image Columns in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-work-with-image-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é parte de um exemplo maior disponível em [como: trabalhar com colunas de imagem em controle de DataGridView dos Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-work-with-image-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate" /> property is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the icon displayed in the cells of this column when the cell's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value" /> property is not set and the cell's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon" /> property is set to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o ícone exibido nas células desta coluna quando a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value" /> da célula não está definida e a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon" /> da célula está definida como <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Icon" /> to display.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Icon" /> a ser exibido.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Icon%2A> property specifies an icons that is displayed in cells with no values when the column is not data-bound and the cell's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Icon%2A> propriedade especifica uma ícones que são exibidos em células com valores de quando a coluna não está associado a dados e a célula <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A> está definida como `true`.

trans-unit.source: For a data-bound column whose cells do not have an associated image, a standard error graphic is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Para uma coluna de associação de dados cujas células não têm uma imagem associada, o gráfico de erro padrão é exibido.

trans-unit.source: Using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Icon%2A> property rather than the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Image%2A> property ensures that an alpha channel in an icon is painted correctly.
trans-unit.target: Usando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Icon%2A> propriedade em vez de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Image%2A> propriedade garante que um canal alfa em um ícone é pintado corretamente.

trans-unit.source: If you want to display an <xref:System.Drawing.Image> instead of an <xref:System.Drawing.Icon>, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Image%2A> property instead and set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se você deseja exibir um <xref:System.Drawing.Image> em vez de um <xref:System.Drawing.Icon>, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Image%2A> propriedade em vez disso e defina o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A> propriedade `false`.

trans-unit.source: You can also set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A> property of individual cells to indicate whether the cell displays the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Image%2A> or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Icon%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A> propriedades de células individuais para indicar se a célula exibe o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Image%2A> ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Icon%2A> o valor da propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the image displayed in the cells of this column when the cell's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value" /> property is not set and the cell's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon" /> property is set to <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a imagem exibida nas células desta coluna quando a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value" /> da célula não está definida e a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon" /> da célula está definida como <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> to display.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> a ser exibido.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Image%2A> property specifies an image that is displayed in cells with no values when the column is not data-bound and the cell's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Image%2A> propriedade especifica uma imagem que é exibida em células com valores de quando a coluna não está associado a dados e a célula <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A> está definida como `false`.

trans-unit.source: For a data-bound column whose cells do not have an associated image, a standard error graphic is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Para uma coluna de associação de dados cujas células não têm uma imagem associada, o gráfico de erro padrão é exibido.

trans-unit.source: If you want to display an <xref:System.Drawing.Icon> instead of an <xref:System.Drawing.Image>, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Icon%2A> property instead and set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Se você deseja exibir um <xref:System.Drawing.Icon> em vez de um <xref:System.Drawing.Image>, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Icon%2A> propriedade em vez disso e defina o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A> propriedade `true`.

trans-unit.source: This ensures that the alpha channel of the <xref:System.Drawing.Icon> is painted correctly.
trans-unit.target: Isso garante que o canal alfa do <xref:System.Drawing.Icon> é pintado corretamente.

trans-unit.source: You can also set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A> property of individual cells to indicate whether the cell displays the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Image%2A> or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Icon%2A> property value when there is no cell value.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A> propriedades de células individuais para indicar se a célula exibe o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Image%2A> ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Icon%2A> valor da propriedade quando não há nenhum valor de célula.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to set the default image.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como definir a imagem padrão.

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Work with Image Columns in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-work-with-image-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é parte de um exemplo maior disponível em [como: trabalhar com colunas de imagem em controle de DataGridView dos Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-work-with-image-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the image layout in the cells for this column.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o layout da imagem nas células desta coluna.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCellLayout" /> that specifies the cell layout.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCellLayout" /> que especifica o layout da célula.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCellLayout.Normal" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCellLayout.Normal" />.

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ImageLayout%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Obter ou definir esta propriedade obtém ou define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ImageLayout%2A> propriedade do objeto retornado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ImageLayout%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: Definir esta propriedade também define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ImageLayout%2A> propriedade de cada célula na coluna e atualiza a coluna exibida.

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: Para substituir o valor especificado para células individuais, defina os valores de célula depois de definir o valor da coluna.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to stretch and zoom images to fit cells.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como alongar e imagens para ajustar as células de zoom.

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Work with Image Columns in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-work-with-image-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é parte de um exemplo maior disponível em [como: trabalhar com colunas de imagem em controle de DataGridView dos Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-work-with-image-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate" /> property is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that describes the column.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma cadeia de caracteres que descreve a coluna.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that describes the column.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.String" /> que descreve a coluna.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether cells in this column display <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Icon" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se as células nesta coluna exibem valores <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Icon" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if cells display values of type <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Icon" />; <see langword="false" /> if cells display values of type <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se as células exibem valores do tipo <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Icon" />; <see langword="false" /> se as células exibem valores do tipo <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: To ensure that the alpha channel of <xref:System.Drawing.Icon> values is painted correctly, set this property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Para garantir que o canal alfa de <xref:System.Drawing.Icon> valores é pintado corretamente, defina essa propriedade como `true`.

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Obter ou definir esta propriedade obtém ou define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A> propriedade do objeto retornado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: Definir esta propriedade também define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A> propriedade de cada célula na coluna e atualiza a coluna exibida.

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: Para substituir o valor especificado para células individuais, defina os valores de célula depois de definir o valor da coluna.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property has a value equal to the standard error graphic of type <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>, changing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A> property value to `true` automatically sets <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> to the standard error graphic of type <xref:System.Drawing.Icon>.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> propriedade do objeto retornado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A> propriedade tem um valor igual ao gráfico de erro padrão do tipo <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>, alterando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A> valor da propriedade `true` define automaticamente <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> para o gráfico de erro padrão do tipo <xref:System.Drawing.Icon>.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> has a value equal to the standard error graphic of type <xref:System.Drawing.Icon>, changing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A> property value to `false` automatically sets <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> to the standard error graphic of type <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> tem um valor igual ao gráfico de erro padrão do tipo <xref:System.Drawing.Icon>, alterando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A> valor da propriedade `false` define automaticamente <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> para o gráfico de erro padrão do tipo <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate" /> property is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate" /> é <see langword="null" />.
